name: Ochre Jelly
conditionImmunities: Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Exhaustion, Frightened, Prone

specialAbilities.name: Amorphous
specialAbilities.description: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

specialAbilities.name: Spider Climb
specialAbilities.description: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.
